sentences.sentence: I and another new teacher were in charge of the "Ringers" game.
sentences.translation: 我和另一个新老师是负责的的“铃声”游戏。

sentences.sentence: Some of the most important NYSE bell ringers have been famous not for who they are, but rather for what they have done.
sentences.translation: 最重要的那些敲过钟的人并非因为他们是谁而著名，而是因为他们的所作所为。

sentences.sentence: The ringers (i.e., nonscientists) at last week’s hearing weren’t of quite the same caliber, but their prepared testimony still had some memorable moments.
sentences.translation: 这些伪专家（非科学家）上周的口径并不完全一致，但是他们事先准备好的证词有着似曾相识的感觉。
